description: This file defines the AboutActivity class for an Android app, responsible for displaying app information including name, description, version, and navigation to privacy policy and licenses screens. It sets up the toolbar, loads UI elements, retrieves the app version dynamically, and handles click events for navigation.

classes.name: AboutActivity
classes.description: An Android activity that presents app information including name, description, version, and navigation options to Privacy Policy and Licenses pages.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets layout, configures toolbar, loads UI elements, retrieves app version, and sets click listeners for navigation.
